title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 645-3.1 - Purpose and intent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 645-3.1 - Purpose and intent

State Regulations

The purpose of this Subpart is to implement the
provisions of SEQR relative to actions directly undertaken, funded or approved
by the commission, other than exempt or excluded actions, and to otherwise
implement SEQR to the fullest extent possible to ensure that the resources of
the park are protected to the maximum extent possible. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
645-3.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
